key.name: check-format-guid
key.summary: GUID of predefined check format to use
key.description: This value specifies the predefined check format to use. The number is the guid of a known check format.

key.name: check-position
key.description: On preprinted checks containing multiple checks per page, this setting specifies which check position to print. The possible values are 0, 1 and 2, corresponding to the top, middle and bottom checks on the page.

key.name: first-page-count
key.summary: Number of checks to print on the first page.
key.description: Number of checks to print on the first page.

key.name: date-format
key.description: This is the numerical identifier of the predefined date format to use.

key.name: date-format-user
key.description: If the date format is set to indicate a custom date format, this value is used as an argument to strftime to produce the date to be printed. It may be any valid strftime string; for more information about this format, read the manual page of strftime by "man 3 strftime".

key.name: custom-units
key.summary: Units in which the custom coordinates are expressed
key.description: Units in which the custom coordinates are expressed (inches, mm, ...).

key.name: custom-payee
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the payee line on the check.

key.name: custom-date
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the date line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-amount-words
key.summary: Position of check amount in words
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the written amount line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-amount-number
key.summary: Position of check amount in numbers
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the numerical amount line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-address
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the payee address line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-notes
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the notes line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-memo
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the memo line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-translation
key.description: This value contains the X,Y offset for the complete check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: custom-rotation
key.description: Number of degrees to rotate the check.

key.name: splits-amount
key.summary: Position of split's amount in numbers
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the split's amount line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: splits-memo
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the split's memo line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: splits-account
key.description: This value contains the X,Y coordinates for the start of the split's account line on the check. Coordinates are from the lower left corner of the specified check position.

key.name: print-date-format
key.summary: Print the date format below the date.
key.description: Each time the date is printed, print the date format immediately below in 8 point type using the characters Y, M, and D.

key.name: default-font
key.description: The default font to use when printing checks. This value will be overridden by any font specified in a check description file.

key.name: blocking-chars
key.description: Print '***' before and after text.

key.name: last-geometry
key.description: This setting describes the size and position of the window when it was last closed. The numbers are the X and Y coordinates of the top left corner of the window followed by the width and height of the window.
